HeroSection.title: Innovate Create Elevate.
HeroSection.subtitle: TechVision is your strategic partner in navigating the digital landscape. We build cutting-edge solutions that drive growth and transform businesses.

Footer.aboutParagraph: We are a passionate team of developers, designers, and strategists dedicated to crafting exceptional digital experiences.
Footer.visionText: To be a leading force in digital innovation, shaping the future of technology for businesses worldwide.
Footer.valuesText: Integrity, collaboration, and an unwavering pursuit of excellence.

PartnersSection.title: Trusted by the world’s most innovative teams

AboutSection.title: About TechVision
AboutSection.paragraph: We are a team of passionate developers, designers, and strategists dedicated to crafting exceptional digital experiences. Our mission is to empower businesses with technology that is not only powerful but also intuitive and elegant.
AboutSection.visionText: To be a leading force in digital innovation, shaping the future of technology for businesses worldwide.
AboutSection.valuesText: Integrity, Collaboration, and a relentless pursuit of Excellence.

ServicesSection.title: Our Services
ServicesSection.subtitle: We offer a comprehensive suite of technology services designed to help you achieve your business goals.

WhyChooseUsSection.title: Why Choose TechVision?
WhyChooseUsSection.subtitle: We don't just build products; we build partnerships. Our commitment to excellence and innovation sets us apart.

quality.title: Quality First
quality.description: We adhere to the highest standards to deliver robust and reliable solutions.

agile.title: Agile & Fast
agile.description: Our agile methodology ensures fast-paced development and on-time delivery.

customer.title: Customer-Centric
customer.description: We work closely with you to understand your vision and bring it to life.

PortfolioSection.title: Our Work
PortfolioSection.subtitle: We are proud of the solutions we've delivered. Explore some of our recent projects.

TeamSection.title: Meet Our Team
TeamSection.subtitle: The brilliant minds behind our success.

TestimonialsSection.title: What Our Clients Say
TestimonialsSection.subtitle: We've helped businesses of all sizes achieve their goals. Here's what they have to say.

items.q1: What is the typical project timeline?
items.a1: Project timelines vary depending on the scope and complexity. A standard website may take 4-6 weeks, while a complex web application can take several months. We provide a detailed timeline after our initial consultation.
items.q2: How do you handle project management?
items.a2: We use agile methodologies and tools like Jira or Trello to manage projects. You'll have a dedicated project manager and regular check-ins to keep you updated on progress.
items.q3: Do you provide support after the project is completed?
items.a3: Yes, we offer various support and maintenance packages to ensure your application remains secure, updated, and running smoothly.
items.q4: What technologies do you specialize in?
items.a4: We specialize in modern web technologies including React, Next.js, Node.js, and various cloud platforms like AWS and Google Cloud. We choose the best tech stack for your specific needs.

CtaSection.title: Ready to Start Your Next Project?
CtaSection.subtitle: Let's build something amazing together. Contact us today for a free consultation and quote.

ContactSection.title: Contact Us
ContactSection.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Fill out the form, and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
